name: Cheesy Garlic Bread
description: Crispy on the outside, soft and garlicky on the inside, generously topped with melted cheese. Order now for a delectable appetizer that's sure to please! Baked with garlic butter and cheese

name: Art Chicken Wings (Small)
description: Crispy on the outside, tender and juicy on the inside, tossed in your choice of flavorful sauces. Order now for a tantalizing taste sensation!

description: Crispy on the outside, tender and juicy on the inside, tossed in your choice of flavorful sauces. Order now for a tantalizing taste sensation!

name: Fried Chicken Sandwich

name: Fried Chicken Sandwich+S.Caramel Shake
description: A hearty sandwich, fries, and salted caramel shake combo set to complete your day with flavour and great savings.

name: Bbq Chicken In Rustic Ciabatta
description: Succulent grilled chicken, tangy BBQ sauce, crisp lettuce, and creamy mayo, all nestled in a warm, crusty ciabatta. Order now for a mouthwatering BBQ treat!

name: Umami Beef With Rice
description: Tender braised beef in a rich oriental sauce with white onion, green pepper, and spring onion, fried rice & a spicy Korean cucumber salad on the side

name: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl+Hibiscus Lemonade
description: A bowl featuring tender chicken marinated in a sweet-and-savoury teriyaki sauce, served over steamed rice and crisp vegetables. The floral undertone of a hibiscus lemonade brings a refreshing contrast, making it a convenient choice for a quick lunch or laid-back dinner. Suits those seeking a simple, light yet satisfying meal.

name: Sweet&Spicy Chicken
description: Chicken cooked in sweet chilli sauce served with rice & steamed vegetables

name: Steak Of The Day
description: Enjoy our chef-selected steak, freshly prepared and perfectly grilled each day. Each serving includes a premium cut of beef seasoned with a unique blend of spices, cooked to your preferred doneness, and paired with fresh sides

name: Slow Cooked Bbq Beef
description: A tender, juicy beef cooked low and slow for hours, marinated in a rich barbecue sauce with smoky, savoury and slightly sweet flavours. Perfect for sandwiches, tacos, or paired with sides, it offers a melt-in-your-mouth experience ideal for any barbecue lover.

name: Silk Route Noodles
description: Rice noodles tossed with fresh veggies in savoury wok sauce, topped with red bullet, coriander, and spicy nuts.

name: Silk Route Noodles Veg
description: Wok-tossed noodles with fresh vegetables, garlic, and ginger in a savory soy-sesame sauce—flavorful, aromatic, and satisfying.

name: Silk Route Chicken Noodles
description: Wok-tossed noodles with tender chicken, fresh vegetables, garlic, and ginger in a savory soy-sesame sauce—flavorful, aromatic, and satisfying.

name: Seasoned Chips
description: Crispy on the outside, fluffy on the inside, and perfectly seasoned for a burst of flavor in every bite. Order now for a savory side that complements any meal! Served with our delicious aioli sauce.

name: Mango Mustard Grilled Fish
description: Featuring a perfectly grilled fillet infused with the tangy sweetness of ripe mango and the zesty kick of mustard. This dish offers a delightful balance of flavours, with tender fish complemented by a bold, fruity glaze. Ideal for seafood lovers seeking a unique and refreshing taste!

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Salmon fillet seasoned with fresh herbs and olive oil, topped with dill butter, Served with Mediterranean vegetables.

name: Monkey Munch Smoothie (Kids)
description: A delicious and nutritious blend made with chia seeds, granola, ripe bananas, and creamy milk and chia .This smoothie offers a perfect , rich texture from the banana and milk.

description: Sweet corn, peppers, onion, bullet chilli, coriander garnish.

name: Margherita Basilico Pizza
description: Fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, fragrant basil, and Mozzarella on a thin, crispy crust. Order now for a taste of classic Italian simplicity.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: Escape to the tropics with our Hawaiian Pizza! Juicy pineapple, bacon and melted mozzarella on pomodoro sauce base. Order now for a sweet and savory delight!

name: Diavola Pizza
description: Indulge in the rich, bold flavors of Italy with our Salami pizza. Featuring savory salami, tangy pomodoro sauce, creamy mozzarella, briny capers, aromatic oregano, and a kick of chillies, all on a perfectly crispy crust. Order now and experience a true taste of Italy!

name: Cajun Chicken Pizza

name: Beef Sausage Pizza

name: Iced Tea
description: Freshly brewed tea with slight sweetness, served over ice.

description: Rich espresso blended with chocolate and milk, served over ice for a smooth, refreshing boost. Cool, creamy, and perfectly balanced.

description: Frothy and refreshing espresso with cold milk, served over ice for a delightful treat.

description: Moist and fragrant, infused with delicate vanilla flavor for a delightful treat. Order now for a perfect accompaniment to your morning or afternoon tea!

description: Moist and decadent, with layers of rich chocolate flavor. Perfect for a sweet indulgence with your favorite cup of tea. Order now for a delightful treat!

description: Moist, spiced, and bursting with sweet carrot flavor. Perfect for a cozy treat with your afternoon tea. Order now for a delightful indulgence!

description: Select any 3 of our house tea cakes at an easy price of 1590/-

name: Savoury Cheese Pastry
description: Flaky, buttery pastry filled with a blend of delicious cheeses, baked to perfection. Order now for a delightful savory snack!

name: Art Burger + Strawberry Lemonade
description: A juicy artisan burger with fresh toppings, paired with a refreshing strawberry lemonade. Bold, tasty, and perfectly balanced.

name: Art Burger
description: Succulent beef patty layered with creamy melted cheese, crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, roasted peppers, and zesty pickled cucumber all nestled between toasted sesame buns. Experience the perfect harmony of flavors and textures in every bite.

name: Beet It Burger
description: A beetroot burger with Pandemi bread spread with mayo and salsa verde. Layered with lettuce, everyday cheese, sliced onions, and tomatoes served with Fries & Art Chilli

name: Classic Beef Burger + Hibiscus Lemonade
description: A lightly seasoned beef patty, lettuce, tomato, and a simple sauce on a toasted bun, paired with hibiscus-infused lemonade. The floral notes balance the burger's savoury flavour, providing a straightforward yet appealing option. It suits quick lunches or relaxed gatherings, maintaining a genuine, down-to-earth feel. Perfect for everyday dining needs.

name: Classic Beef Burger
description: Enjoy our juicy beef burger, layered with fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes, crisp onions, and tangy pickles. Topped with creamy mayonnaise and signature rose sauce, it's served with seasoned fries and a side of house slaw for the perfect meal.

name: Classic Chicken Burger
description: Tender, juicy chicken breast, seasoned to perfection and served on a soft bun with crisp lettuce, ripe tomato, and our special sauce. Order now for a delicious twist on a classic favorite!

name: Double Cheese Burger
description: Juicy double cheese burger with layers of melted cheese, perfect for a hearty meal.

name: Texas Burger
description: A hearty beef patty topped with crispy bacon, tangy BBQ sauce, melted cheese, and crunchy onion rings, all on a toasted bun. Order now for a taste of bold Texan flavors!

name: Bread Basket
description: Freshly baked bread

name: Breakfast Croissant
description: Wholegrain croissant, two eggs prepared to your liking, crispy bacon, tomatoes, cheese & served with a side of salad.

name: Eggs & Toast
description: Two eggs prepared to your liking Served with toasted bread, butter & homemade jam

name: Everyday Breakfast
description: Choose your toast, two sausages, two eggs (to your liking), choice of home fries or french fries, served with butter and our fan favourite Art Jam (tree tomato).

name: French Toast
description: Thick slices of challah bread, dipped in a rich egg batter and griddled to perfection, served with a drizzle of artisan jam and a side of vibrant fruit salad.

name: Mango Granola Bowl
description: A refreshing granola bowl with fresh diced mango, mango yogurt, crunchy granola, a drizzle of honey, and a mint garnish.

name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy stacks served with a drizzle of maple syrup and a dollop of butter. Order now for a timeless breakfast delight! Served with fresh fruit salad & maple syrup

name: Beef Sausages(2pcs)
description: Savour our beef sausages made from high-quality beef, expertly seasoned for a rich, satisfying flavor. Perfect for breakfast, grilling, or quick meals, these sausages deliver a hearty taste in every bite.

name: The Nairobian
description: Our signature chapati pairs with kachumbari scrambled eggs, two sausages, and tender boiled sweet potato for a breakfast that awakens the Kenyan in you

name: Tropical Fruit Salad
description: A vibrant mix of fresh fruits, bursting with tropical flavors. Served with mint & basil. Order now for a refreshing taste of paradise!

name: Butter Curry Chicken
description: Featuring tender pieces of chicken simmered in a velvety tomato-based sauce infused with aromatic spices and a touch of butter. A flavourful dish perfectly balanced, offering a mild yet savoury curry experience.

name: Chicken Wings & Rosemary Fries
description: Crispy chicken wings marinated in an aromatic sauce of your choice, served with a side of fries for a savory and satisfying combo. Order now for a flavorful feast! Served in a sauce of your choice

description: Tender, perfectly seasoned, and grilled to juicy perfection. A flavorful and protein-packed delight!Grilled chicken served with rice & steamed vegetables

name: Babu's Meatball Pasta (Kids)
description: Babu's Meatball Pasta features tender, savory meatballs served over perfectly cooked pasta, smothered in a rich, flavorful tomato sauce. Garnished with fresh herbs and Parmesan cheese, this hearty dish delivers a satisfying, Italian-inspired meal that's both comforting and delicious.

name: Baby Tembos Fruit Salad (Kids)
description: Refreshing medley of seasonal fruits, carefully cut into vibrant, bite-sized pieces. Each serving features a balanced mix of sweet and tangy flavors, tossed together for a colorful and nutritious treat. Ideal as a light snack or a healthy addition to any meal!

name: Cheeky Bongalalas Crepe (Kids)
description: Delicate, thin crepe with a light and fluffy texture, filled with banana, our art jam. Drizzled with chocolate sauce. It’s a delightful treat perfect for breakfast, dessert, or any time you need a delicious bite!

name: Choco Banana Shake (Kids)
description: Choco Banana Shake combines ripe bananas and rich chocolate in a creamy, smooth blend. A delightful, indulgent treat that's perfect for any time of day!

name: Fresh Juice (Kids)
description: A choice of mango or apple juice.

name: Hot Chocolate (Kids)
description: Treat your little ones to our Kids Hot Chocolate! Creamy, rich it's the perfect warm and comforting drink for young taste buds. Order now to make their day extra sweet!

name: MB's Fried Chicken Fingers (Kids)
description: Tender strips of juicy chicken, coated in a crispy, seasoned breading and fried to golden perfection. Perfect as a snack or main, they deliver a satisfying crunch with every bite.

name: Moyo's Cinnamon Sugar French Toast Sticks (Kids)
description: Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside, these French toast sticks are coated in cinnamon sugar for a sweet, comforting treat. Perfect for breakfast or a quick snack.

name: Mrs Tam Tam's Savoury Pancakes (Kids)
description: Savoury, fluffy herb and cheese pancakes topped with crispy candied bacon. A deliciously savoury twist on a breakfast classic!

name: Peter Pizza's Margherita (Kids)
description: Peter Pizza’s signature Margherita is a timeless classic featuring a perfectly baked thin crust topped with a rich, tangy tomato sauce and generous layers of creamy, fresh mozzarella. Accented by the subtle sweetness of ripe tomatoes and a drizzle of olive oil, this pizza is finished with fragrant basil leaves, offering a simple yet irresistible blend of flavors

description: A healthy kick of cucumber, kale, moringa, ginger, lemon juice, pineapple mint juice, avocado and honey. Refreshing and energizing.

name: Iron Frost Fusion Smoothie
description: A nutritious blend of iron-rich ingredients like beetroot, avocado & spinach, alongside ginger, hibiscus tea and honey. Provides a tasty & energizing way to support your health.

name: Art Burger
description: Succulent beef patty layered with creamy melted cheese, crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, roasted peppers, and zesty pickled cucumber all nestled between toasted sesame buns. Experience the perfect harmony of flavors and textures in every bite.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Tender grilled chicken served atop crisp lettuce, accompanied by savory ciabatta croutons and drizzled with creamy Caesar dressing. Topped with shaved Parmesan cheese and zesty capers for an added burst of flavour.

name: Green Harvest Bowl
description: A vibrant and nutritious meal featuring tender grilled chicken paired with fresh spinach. Complemented by honey mustard-dressed vegetables, creamy beetroot hummus, and rich guacamole. Served alongside fragrant lemon herb rice and soft, artisanal focaccia. Topped with zesty pickled onions and a crunchy super seed salad topper for a perfect balance of flavors and textures.

name: Grilled Halloumi Salad
description: Tender grilled halloumi cheese paired with roasted vegetables, crisp lettuce, and kale, all tossed in a flavorful honey mustard dressing. Topped with crunchy salad topper and served with a side of garlic bread.

name: Heart Beet Bowl
description: A flavourful bowl with beetroot sesame balls in hoisin-teriyaki sauce, Korean salad, crispy seasoned kale, and fried rice, garnished with sesame seeds, fresh coriander & chillies.

name: Kyoto Meat Bowl
description: A hearty bowl with teriyaki meatballs, Korean cucumber salad, fried rice, crispy kale, and garnished with sesame & spicy.

name: Prawns Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with garlic croutons, Parmesan cheese, and our signature Caesar dressing. Topped with succulent prawns, this flavorful and satisfying twist on the classic salad is perfect for seafood lovers.

name: Samurai Salad With Chicken
description: A vibrant Asian salad with stir-fried chicken, fresh veggies, mango, herbs, Thai dressing & spicy nuts

name: Santorini Salad
description: A well-composed salad featuring grilled chicken, candied bacon, fresh vegetables, pickled onions, boiled egg, and feta cheese, dressed in garlic ranch. Served with warm garlic bread.

name: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl
description: Tender teriyaki chicken served with fragrant fried rice, accompanied by a vibrant red cabbage cucumber salad, tangy pickled carrots and radish, & guacamole.

name: The Mexican Salad
description: A vibrant fiesta of flavors awaits with crisp lettuce, fresh red peppers, sweet corn, juicy tomatoes, creamy avocado, fried cauliflower, and gouda cheese, all tossed in a zesty lime-cilantro dressing and topped with a bold salsa. Enjoy a satisfying taste of Mexico in every bite with your choice of a Vegetable or Chicken Mexican Salad.

name: Vegetarian Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with garlic croutons, Parmesan cheese, and our signature Caesar dressing. A flavorful and satisfying twist on the classic salad, perfect for veggie lovers.

name: Vegetarian Samurai Salad
description: A vibrant Asian salad, fresh veggies, mango, herbs, Thai dressing & spicy nuts

name: Art Pesto Chicken
description: Succulent grilled chicken breast smothered in aromatic basil creamy pesto sauce. Order now for a flavorful masterpiece!

name: Art Pesto Veg
description: Indulge in our Art Pesto Veg! Fresh vegetables tossed in aromatic creamy pesto sauce and parmesan. Order now for a flavorful and satisfying vegetarian option!

name: Lasagne Bolognese
description: Rich beef ragu in between layers of pasta, topped with bechamel sauce & mozzarella cheese.

name: Penne Arrabiata
description: A zesty pasta dish featuring al dente penne tossed in a fiery tomato sauce infused with garlic, chilli flakes, eggplant, and fresh herbs. A tantalizing blend of heat and flavor to delight your taste buds.

name: Prawns In Pink Sauce
description: Tasty prawns tossed with al dente tagliatelle pasta in a savory garlic butter sauce, topped with fresh herbs. Order now for a delightful seafood pasta experience!

name: Spaghetti Meatballs+Carrot Cake Slice
description: Treat yourself to our chef's spaghetti and meatballs entrée with a complimentary slice of carrot cake.

name: Beef Steak In Rustic Ciabatta Sandwich
Pesto Caprese Melt Sandwich
description: Savour the layers of fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and vibrant basil pesto, all grilled to perfection on artisanal bread. Accompanied by a refreshing garden salad and a crispy side of chips, this meal is a perfect blend of flavours and textures.
